snippet: Young lawyers and paralegals are being sought for the community service program AmeriCorps to provide legal assistance in immigration proceedings to children who come to the U.S. illegally....

headline.print_headline: AmeriCorps to Provide Legal Aid to Immigrant Kids
headline.main: AmeriCorps to Provide Legal Aid to Immigrant Kids

lead_paragraph: Young lawyers and paralegals are being sought for the community service program AmeriCorps to provide legal assistance in immigration proceedings to children who come to the U.S. illegally.
